main event: A civilian observed a round object with a bright yellow-white glow traveling soundlessly in Hiram, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was described as being similar in size and shape to a hub cap., The object left a trail of bright yellow with no observed propulsion system., It was traveling from south to north before disappearing into a cloud., The object was seen moving at a very slow speed., The report concluded that there was insufficient data for a definitive evaluation.
sighted object: a round object with a bright yellow-white glow
